std_inline.citation:
'''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Engela Elisabeth Christina Smit"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Swartland (Malmesbury), Baptism register, 1783-1809, page 170. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G5 3/3. Transcribed by Lizette Svoboda, from photographs of Cape Archives VC 667
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Child with smit anywhere in the surname with Engela Elisabeth Christina anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Engela Elisabeth Christina Smit baptism on 5 Apr 1801 (born dn 20 Febr:), daughter of Maarten Johs Smit & Adriana Beatrix Smit.

std_narrative.citation:
Engela, daughter of Maarten Johs Smit & Adriana Beatrix Smit, was born in dn 20 Febr: and baptised on 5 April 1801. '''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Engela Elisabeth Christina Smit"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Swartland (Malmesbury), Baptism register, 1783-1809, page 170. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G5 3/3. Transcribed by Lizette Svoboda, from photographs of Cape Archives VC 667
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Child with smit anywhere in the surname with Engela Elisabeth Christina anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Engela Elisabeth Christina Smit baptism on 5 Apr 1801 (born dn 20 Febr:), daughter of Maarten Johs Smit & Adriana Beatrix Smit.
